modName: a Dimebag Darrell Lance Abbott memorial banner
summary: The banner at the temple of Mara in Riften is now a tribute to one of the most awesome people who ever lived!
descriptionHtml:
Textures: Wolbryne
Model: original

Mod info: The banner at the temple of Mara in Riften is now a tribute to one of the most awesome people who ever lived!

Requirements: Skyrim

Conflicts: It modifies the vanilla templebannerriftenn01.dds and will overwrite anything else that changes the mara temple banner.

Location: The temple of Mara in Riften.

Permissions: You\'re allowed to use this texture in whatever mod you want just credit me for it.

Credits and thanks: Thanks to Brother Dime and Pantera. Your music helped me through the worst of times.


Enjoy!

/Wolbryne
author: Wolbryne
